data.comment: The match is underway. Nottingham have kicked-off.
Bristol City take a 0-1 lead thanks to Andreas Weimann.
In the minute 22, Nahki Wells puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a strike by Luke Freeman. .
Jack Hunt (Bristol City) has received a yellow card from Keith Stroud.
In the minute 42, Alfie Mawson for Bristol City has been booked by Keith Stroud and receives a first yellow card.
The first-half is over at City Ground.
The second half is underway in Nottingham - Bristol City with the kick-off.
In the minute 60, Sabri Lamouchi (Nottingham) is making a first substitution, with Nuno Da Costa replacing Sammy Ameobi.
The away team have replaced Nahki Wells with Antoine Semenyo. This is the first substitution made today by Dean Holden.
Samba Sow is replacing Harry Arter for Nottingham at City Ground.
In the minute 68, Sabri Lamouchi is making the team's third substitution at City Ground with Lyle Taylor replacing Alexander Mighten.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a second substitution, with Chris Brunt replacing Jamie Paterson.
Famara Diedhiou is on a sub for Chris Martin for Bristol City.
That's full-time at City Ground. The final score is 1-2.
